verses.verse: <S%H3467>Help<s%>, <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; for the godly <S%H2623>man<s%> <S%H1584>ceases<s%>; for the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6461>fail<s%> from among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.

They <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>: with <S%H2513>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> and with a <S%H3820>double<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> do they <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all <S%H2513>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>, and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> that <S%H1696>speaks<s%> proud <S%H1419>things<s%>:
Who have <S%H559>said<s%>, With our <S%H3956>tongue<s%> will we <S%H1396>prevail<s%>; our <S%H8193>lips<s%> are our <S%H113>own<s%>: who is lord over us?

For the <S%H7701>oppression<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, for the <S%H603>sighing<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%>, now will I <S%H6965>arise<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; I will <S%H7896>set<s%> him in <S%H3468>safety<s%> from him that puffs at <S%H6315>him<s%>.

The <S%H565>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H565>words<s%>: as <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H6884>tried<s%> in a <S%H5948>furnace<s%> of <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H2212>purified<s%> seven <S%H7659>times<s%>.
You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, O Lord, you shall <S%H5341>preserve<s%> them from <S%H2098>this<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, when the <S%H2149>vilest<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%> are <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
